Content: Hello everyone I'm about to buy a 2012 honda cbr250r with 25k miles on it, sticky throttle (minor fix) and a right mirror missing, also a dead battery . I'm bringing a new battery to the meet up. Everything else works and is up to date clean title . Just want to know if the buying price of 1700 is good .I checked kbb and they're valued at like 3k but just want to hear some thoughts. Thanks!
